Description: A combination of the best aspects of humanoids and dragons, who are proud of their heritage.
Vision: Standard: Need a Torch or magic to see in the Dark
raceAbilities: Draconic Ancestry: Choose one type of dragon. Your breath weapon and damage are determined by the dragon type.

Breath Weapon: Draconic Ancestry determines size, shape, damage type, and type of saving throw. DC = 8 + Con Mod + Prof Bonus. Damage is 2d6 on a failed save with half damage on a successful one. (Damage becomes 3d6 at 6th level, 4d6 at 11th level, and 5d6 at 16th level) Can only be used once per short or long rest.
Damage Resistance: You have resistance to the damage type associated with your draonic ancestry.
